title: Hurricane tracks for Milton (2024) — data_milton
text: ## `data_milton` data frame 62 rows 7 columns: name Character - Storm name given agency iso_time POSIXct - Time provided Universal Time Coordinates (UTC). Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss points provided 6 hour intervals. lat Numeric - Latitude decimal degrees lon Numeric - Longitude decimal degrees wind_speed Numeric - Maximum sustained wind speed knots: 0 - 300 kts. (1-min. mean) pressure Numeric - Minimum sea level pressure, 850 - 1050 mb. sshs Numeric - Saffir–Simpson hurricane scale. values defined follows:   -5 = Unknown   -4 = Post-tropical   -3 = Miscellaneous disturbances   -2 = Subtropical   Tropical systems classified based wind speeds   -1 = Tropical depression (W<34)   0 = Tropical storm (34<W<64)   1 = Category 1 (64<=W<83)   2 = Category 2 (83<=W<96)   3 = Category 3 (96<=W<113)   4 = Category 4 (113<=W<137)   5 = Category 5 (W >= 137)
